title: South Park - Stick of Truth - Poop Like a Pro with your Keyboard
description:
This is a little macro I found that will let you win the pooping mini games. You apparently get treasure for doing so!

This is basically a macro that presses the 's' key rapidly for you.

Instructions:

1) When your gonna poop, minimize your game
2) Download the MacroPoop.rar (Contains 2 files)
3) Open file name: "tinytask145.exe"
4) Hit the configuration icon at the right side of the screen (or press key "enter")
5) Now click the option "continuous playback"
6) Again, OPTION, Now Click "Play Speed: Fast"
7) Click the Folder Icon (Left side) (or press key "O")
8) Find the file "replaymeusingtinytasktopoop.rec", open it.
9) Now click the green icon that says "PLAY".
10) Go back to your game, try poop now. (It should automatically do it now)

DONE, Enjoy!
